documents.name: Main
documents.content: Finish UI prototype

documents.name: Main
documents.content:
Hey, you made it! This is the Editor, where you'll be doing most of your writing. Let's check out a few of its features...

Type / to summon the quick menu.

This lets you format your text and create useful content blocks. For example, you can type /h1 to create a heading block, or /quote to create a quote block. View all the options by typing / and navigating with the arrow keys. Press enter to confirm your choice.

Type @ to mention other pages.

Use @-mentions to build a connected knowledgebase. To mention a page that doesnt' exist yet, you can type the desired page name surrounded by double square brackets '[' to quickly create and mention a new sub-page. You can its position in the page hierarchy by dragging and dropping in the sidebar.

Click the menu button in the top right corner of the screen to open up the Page Menu.

Here you can add tabs to this page, auto-detect and create links using Auto-link, export, save and compare versions of this document, and many other things.

You can check out the Editor's many keyboard shortcuts by selecting Help from the quick menu.

documents.name: Main
documents.content: Any page stored under “Page Templates” can be used as a reusable template in the creation dialog. If you use a template that has sub-pages, its sub-pages will be manifested as well. You can use this feature to create complex, re-usable structures.

documents.content: Chapter 1: An Investigation Agency

Summary

In which the Protagonist investigates a haunted mansion.

Start

The Protagonist is spawned.

End

The Protagonist learns about the Prismatic and that they are Prismatic.

Events

Results

documents.name: Main
documents.content:
Summary

In which the Protagonist investigates a haunted mansion.

Start

The Protagonist is spawned.

Goal

Find the Scientist.

End

The Protagonist learns about the Prismatic and that they are Prismatic.

Events

  1. The Protagonist spawns as the Hunter is shooting deer with a crossbow.

  2. The Protagonist has no memory and the Hunter believes they teleported in from somewhere else.

  3. The Hunter takes the player to the Investigator in Caerule.

  4. The Investigator tells the player to go to the Scientist to find out what happened to them.

  5. The player explores Caerule and finds the Scientist is missing, they went to investigate the Mansion.

  6. The Investigator goes with the Protagonist to the Mansion.

  7. $TMP_LT$$TMP_LT$strange happenings at the Mansion$TMP_GT$$TMP_GT$

  8. The Scientist is returned to Caerule and scans the player, and it is found they are Prismatic.

  9. The Scientist tells the player the Lab will be able to tell them more.

Results

  • Investigator and Hunter become permanent team mates

  • Ghost Girl can be recruited

documents.name: Main
documents.content:
Summary

In which the protagonist heads to the lab at the bottom of the mountain to learn more about the Prismatic.

Start

The Protagonist leaves Caerule to go the Lab.

Goal

Reach the Lab under the Mountain.

End

While camping outside the Flame-Tongue village, the Protagonist sees Arah's Blessing fall.

Events

  1. The Protagonist gathers supplies for the journey in Caerule.

  2. The train didn't come back from the Mountain station. The low road must be taken.

  4. The Flame-Tongue town is reached.

  5. $TMP_LT$$TMP_LT$some event int he Flame-Tongue town$TMP_GT$$TMP_GT$

  6. Arah's Blessing falls.

  • The Immortal Village can be reached but is closed

Results

  • Flametounge Girl can be recruited

documents.name: Main
documents.content:
Summary

In which the Protagonist must appease a waking god.

Start

Red mana surges are seen coming from the landing site on the Mountain.

Goal

Climb the mountain and investigate the fallen star to stop the mana surges.

End

Meet Arah and calm him down.

Events

  1. Castletown and the Lab are being bombarded by mana surges.

  2. The Investigator encourages the player to help the Lab.

  3. The Protagonist helps temporarily hold back the mana.

  4. The Protagonist is sent the sort the problem out as they can survive in the mana storm.

  5. The Protagonist meets Arah, who is confused in his new born state. A battle ensues.

  6. The mana storms stop. Arah allies with the Protagonist.


  • Arah's Blessing is a fallen spaceship that was overrun by red mana. It was drawn to Aurus by other red mana.

Results

documents.name: Main
documents.content:
Summary

In which the Protagonist returns to Caerule

Start

The lab is saved but is too damaged to help the Protagonist

Goal

The Protagonist must fetch parts from Caerule

End

Caerule falls from the sky

Events

  1. The Engineer tells the Protagonist that the Lab is too damaged to help the Protagonist.

  2. The Engineer needs new parts - Caerule should have the parts, so the Protagonist returns to Caerule.

  3. The Protagonist is told $TMP_LT$$TMP_LT$by whom$TMP_GT$$TMP_GT$ that the parts are in the heart of Caerule.

  4. The Protagonist must delve into Caerule.

  5. The Protagonist meets Mercy.

  6. The Protagonist finds the parts.

  7. The Protagonist is lured to the bluff (to prevent the player from being killed by the AMP) and Caerule falls from the sky

  • The train can be fixed

Results

documents.name: Main
documents.content:
Summary

In which the Protagonist must ask the allies of Caerule for help.

Start

The Protagonist is given following tasks:

  • Go to the Immortals for medical help

  • Take the parts to the Lab and ask for help identifying the issue

  • Go to Castletown to ask for ---

  • Go to Oceantown to ask for ---

  • Go to Flametongue village to ask for ---

Goal

Complete given tasks

End

All tasks are complete and the Protagonist returns to Caerule

Events

  • All the world is opened up $TMP_LT$$TMP_LT$how?$TMP_GT$$TMP_GT$

Results

resources.name: Chapter 6: The Beast and the Tree

documents.name: Main
documents.content:
Summary

In which the Protagonist learns about the new world.

Start

The Engineer has finished repairing Caerule's security and the Protagonist witnesses Laluna setting off the AMP and teleporting away using a Purple Crown.

Goal

Help --- be coronated (or don’t) to get an audience with Ouroborous

End

Ouroborous asks the player to find who set off the AMP.

Events

  1. The Scientist works on tracking Laluna using traces from her teleporting, but knows they don’t have the technical knowledge or right tools.

  2. The Protagonist must find a way to find where she went.

  3. $TMP_LT$$TMP_LT$someone$TMP_GT$$TMP_GT$ has heard stories an ancient and knowledgeable being in the heart of the Autumnal forest.

  4. – is going to be coronated but doesn’t want to $TMP_LT$$TMP_LT$why$TMP_GT$$TMP_GT$

  5. Do $TMP_LT$$TMP_LT$some task$TMP_GT$$TMP_GT$ to help – ascend (don’t get the Forest Crown) or don’t (get the Forest Crown instead)

  6. Have an audience with Ourobourus

  7. Ouroborous tells the player about the Mana and the AMP.

  8. Ouroborous tells the player about the Crowns, and that another Purple Crown could be used to track Laluna

  • Ouroborous knows this is a simulation $TMP_LT$$TMP_LT$how?$TMP_GT$$TMP_GT$, he is surprised this is the first run. Much more dialog on a second run.

  • Ouroborous can optionally be fought afterwards (he is very difficult) for more information and $TMP_LT$$TMP_LT$important item$TMP_GT$$TMP_GT$

Results

documents.name: Main
documents.content:
Summary

In which the protagonists must uncover the truth and the villain is revealed.

Start

Go the spymaster to gather intelligence.

Goal

Find a purple crown to teleport to Laluna and steal the AMP.

End

Laluna is found and reveals to the player the predicament.

Events

  2. His Opal Grace tasks the Protagonist with finding his Spiders (agents in deep cover) as they may know where a Crown is.

  4. The Protagonist finds the crown.

  5. The Protagonist returns to the Scientist and teleports using the crown.

  • The Protagonist has already met some of the Spiders

Results

documents.content:

Start

Goal

End

Results

In which the protagonist learns about the old world, the EYE and the Dragon at the Centre of the World.

Start

Goal

End

The Protagonist chooses to kill the new gods or let the human world end.

Events

Biography

Found the EYE and used it to foresee the mana overtaking the world. After that, she saw the mana as a threat to humanity.

Possesses a purple crown.

A member of the Council of Caerule.

Appearance

Tall with slender build.

Blond hair and pale skin.

Usually wears sliver and purple robes. Her hair is usually done up in with pins to resembled crescent moons.

Age:

Location:

documents.name: Main
documents.content:
Biography

Formed when the Star of Arah fell to earth on The Mountain. Took the form of the local legend of Arah, a warrior who the local flame-tongue people believed would appear from the sky to save them from a great threat.

Appearance

Arah is a humanoid figure clad entirely in white futuristic armour with red highlights. His legs, if he has any, are not visible below the rim of the crater.

Age:

Location:

Biography

The first of the New Gods to be born, before humans were released onto the world. Took the form due to the various snake-life figures in human mythology. It is usually curled around Nodrassil, the first tree to be planted on the new world.

Appearance

A colossal pale green-brown snake with antlers.

Age:

documents.name: Main
documents.content:
Biography

An AI created and then copied to be the pilot of all the Worldships. The Mercy of the Aurus worldship was codenamed Mercy-07A.

Upon the worldship arriving on Aurus, she oversaw the release of the mana and the mana for terraforming and the cloning and release of plants and wildlife for the next few thousand years.

When the world was ready she released the humans, but stopped interacting with them once they were established on the surface.

Appearance

A physical description of the character.

Age:

Location:

documents.name: Main
documents.content:
Biography

Judgement was created after the half second war to serve as the interface for the EYE so that no entity could lie about or manipulate the results. His mainframe is integrated with the EYE and is unreachable, so he can only be communicated with via normal means. However, this didn’t work and he can communicate with the other AIs.

Appearance

A physical description of the character.

Biography

The Ghost Girl is a mana copy of dead girl named Lolita, formed from the grief of her parents and their wish to have their daughter back.

Will either take the name Anita or Lolita, depending on if she believes she is Lolita or not.

Appearance

A young girl, about 14 years old.

Medium height and medium build.

Black hair and pale skin.

Usually wears black and white clothing.

Age:

Biography

The Soldier was injured defending a caravan of traders from a Behemoth - he lost his left leg and most of his right arm. Caerule was unable to treat his wounds properly, so he was sent to the Immortals.

Appearance

Medium height and muscular build.

White hair and scarred face.

Usually wears blue and grey clothing.

Has an artificial leg and arm powered by blue mana - a blue-grey metal with orbs of blue mana in the joints.

Age:

Location:

Biography

Her father, Arishi, has recently died of old age, the first Immortal to do so. She is due to inherit the throne and the Crown of Thorns, but is unsure if she wants to.

Appearance

Tall with medium build.

Dark hair and dark skin.

Wears simple brown and forest-green robes.
